text: No.X is the second studio album by South-Korean singer Kim Jae-joong, released on 12 February 2016. The songs represent various genres, including Britpop, pop punk, post-grunge, blues, ballad and rock. It sold over 85,000 copies, making it the 9th most successful album in the first half of 2016 in South Korea. A music video for the title song, "Love You More" was released on 11 February 2016. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2016 albums Category:Kakao M albums Category:Kim Jae-joong albums Category:K-pop albums
title: No.X
